# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an instance of the automatic navigation split view style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency init()
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationSplitViewStyle/automatic] to construct this style.
